post.title: Register .BIT domains for ZeroNet
post.body:
Hello,

This is the official ZeroNet page of PeerName project.

We provide easy registration of .BIT domain names.

For more info, visit our website [PeerName.com](https://peername.com)

Follow instructions [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/cryptonbits.bit/?Post:4:How+to+connect+your+.bit+domain+with+your+Zeronet+site) and [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1QLLPpowM6BWxKYKops1WkCafuFPhFBnAx/?Post:3:Using+.bit+domains) to assign your .BIT domain with your blog.
